name: @nielse63/generate-tests
description: Automatically generate jest specs for uncovered source files
author: Erik Nielsen <erik@312development.com>

scripts.test: echo "Error: run tests from root" && exit 1
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=build babel src --out-dir dist --root-mode upward --delete-dir-on-start --no-comments --config-file ../../babel.config.js
